issue.title: "no result" not displayed
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

When a list has no result, the mention "Aucun enregistrement dans la liste" (translatable string of course) should be displayed.
This view is displaying the right mention : view=resources

Here are the views where it's missing (the one I found):

- view=orders&layout=validation
- view=orders
 
*Possibly, each translatable string should be differentiated so ones can customize mentions*

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.3
